description: Request for Proposal for Senior Data Warehouse Modeller to support the design, build, and implementation of the Corporate Data Warehouse. The aim is to have a fully functional data warehouse that will deliver report and business intelligence information. Period of the Contract will be from the Effective Date of the Contract to October 23, 2023. Original Contract Price: $506,326.91. Current state of contract: Expirée.
tags: Terms and conditions of the contract: the contract will be from Effective date to October 23, 2023.
Service Desired: The information system manager is the project manager.
The work is carried out by : ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
